front.title: IEEE Guide for Specifications of High-Voltage Circuit Breakers (over 1000 Volts)
front.abstract: These specifications apply to all indoor and outdoor types of ac high-voltage circuit breakers rate above 1000 volts, this document is issued only as a guide for use in compiling specifications for ac high-voltage circuit breakers, the imperative mode of the language is illustrative of that used in specifications.
